Header.title: We are Web Therapist
Header.paragraph: We are an online platform which provides you free online therapies which can give you awesome results

About.paragraph: WEB THERAPIST is an online platform which provides every user a facility to burst out their mental stress, and we at WEB THERAPIST use zero physical contact therapies.And you can get all of our services at ZERO costing

Services.name: ChatBot
Services.text: You can talk to our chat bot which can help you get relief from your stress

Services.name: Notification Mind Boosting
Services.text: We provide notification popups on your screen which makes you motivated and happier

Services.name: Stress Busrting Game
Services.text: We provide an amazing stress bursting game
